text: The War Within is the fourth studio album by American heavy metal band Shadows Fall. The album was released on September 21, 2004. It was their final studio album for Century Media before moving to Atlantic Records. ==Track listing== # The Light That Blinds – 4:58 # Enlightened by the Cold – 3:02 # Act of Contrition – 3:41 # What Drives the Weak – 4:44 # Stillness – 4:52 # Inspiration on Demand – 3:52 # The Power of I and I – 3:34 # Ghosts of Past Failures – 4:13 # Eternity Is Within – 4:08 # Those Who Cannot Speak – 5:15 ==References== Category:2004 albums
title: The War Within
